      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="2.0.0-RC2") public LiricalBuilder defaultVariantAlleleFrequency(float defaultVariantAlleleFrequency)

      the option does not belong to the global configuration but to per-sample config (to be removed in v2.0.0).
      Parameters:
      defaultVariantAlleleFrequency - default variant allele frequency to set. The frequency is only used if variantMetadataService(VariantMetadataService) is unset.

      the builder
